## LocalizePipe.transform() method

Gets localized string for specified key, interpolation might be used

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
transform(key: string, interpolateParams?: Object): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | <code>string</code> | Key to be localized |
|  interpolateParams | <code>Object</code> | Optional object storing interpolation parameters |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string`
